name: Pokémon Emerald Renewal
overview: About: The goal was to improve on the standard Emerald rom, without losing the feeling of nostalgia. I decided that I should start working on it again and I'm here to ask your opinion on the hack. I saw Dizzy's amazing work and decided to add it as a module. That's right, I decided to make this hack modular, in the sense that you can choose to download the complete pack, or just choose the modules you want to use (Not finished yet). Features: • Upgraded Battle Engine • Remapped standard maps • RTC • Save compatibility patch • Fixed PRNG • No Decap • 4th gen phys/spec split Known Bugs: • No door animation when playing as MAY + weird water reflection when leaving the car • Gym leader sign in petalburg crashes the game if you attempt to read it
